thread.section_title: Lendio Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lendio | www.lendio.com
thread.title: Michael Schaeffer

author: Michael Schaeffer
title: Michael Schaeffer
text: I am one of the many small businesses that sometimes need funding to make it to the busy season. I tried the google search for top business lenders, and attempted to get funding by going through the application process. After my 7th attempt, I came across Lendio. After just a few minutes of speaking with Jeremiah, I felt I was in the right place! The loan process went super smooth, and literally was funded in hours! I would not hesitate to contact them again if I need funding in the future. Thank you Jeremiah, and Lendio for a better rate than I could find, and Great Customer Service!!!
